name: Can't touch this! (Arcaelia)
description:
Can't touch this! is a game about NOT rolling the dice.

You find yourself on a cute picnic date and you are about to win the game. Your beautiful partner is about to throw the dice in the perfect order... but what is that? Those damn squirrels are shooting nuts again to manipulate the dice! Arrgh and now there are cats everywhere. Defend your partners dice to save the perfect date.

Controls:

Click on all moving objects, but don't touch the dice!


A game by:

Cedric Nering - Programming

Kristin Wünderlich - 2D Art

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
